amendment.description: To clarify the duties and activities of the Vaccine Healthcare Centers Network.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3392 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3392 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6785-6789) To clarify the duties and activities of the Vaccine Healthcare Centers Network.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3392 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3392 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
